page.title: 04GROUP ACTIVITES 03800597
page.content: There are{no specific clubs}in Rochester. The venue for social activities is the{village hall,}a timber_lined building with exterior asbestos walls built after the 1914_18 war. Here the Parish Council meet and the Women's Institute hold their monthly meetings. {Fund_raising groups}hold whist drives, dances, discos, and coffee mornings/evenings here. In 1977, six villagers formed a Silver Jubilee Committee to organise celebrations for the event.This is now the{Social Committee}and provides entertainment for the children to which the whole village is invited.{Annual events}include a Hallowe'en Party, Sports Day and Christmas Disco_dance.
